attributes.action: To scrap this misleading, waste of time policy - E-Petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What a total waste of somebody's time - reading e-petitions and then providing the type of answers which always lets the the prime minister dodge issues raised by the electorate.

The parliament and prime minister (except this one) are elected to represent the people. For god's sake why don't you lot listen to us!!

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
